page.title: 01The Study Area
page.content: Our area is in the North West of England in Cheshire.Our location is 20km South East of Liverpool,40km South West of Manchester,8km North East of Chester,4km South West of Helsby and the River Mersey is 5km to the North. We are a country area and we have cottages and lots of farms scattered all over.Helsby is the nearest town to {Dunham Hill.}We have two other villages near{Dunham Hill}which are {Hapsford}and{Thornton- Le- Moors.}We have a railway running through the area which travels from Warrington to Chester and is the main line. The{M56 motorway runs through. Junction 14 is in the North East of our area.The main roads we have are the{A56}and the {A5117.}We only have one school in our area which is our school{Dunham Hill {C.P.
